Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Initial Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor, his dual identity as Duke O'Dowd, and sets up the initial conflict with a mysterious underwater threat and suspicious G-Men.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction and Premise
sub_scenes.description: The comic cover introduces the Human Meteor and the initial underwater setting and threat.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicious Surveillance
sub_scenes.description: Duke takes rich playboys to the waterfront and notices a G-Man's car following him, creating initial suspense.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Followers

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into the Human Meteor to confront the G-Men, initiating the superhero action.

narrative_arcs.title: The Chase and Human Meteor Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Rooftop Fight and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts 'cop shooters', engages in a rooftop fight, and interacts with police after the conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Briefing and Yacht Conspiracy
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor receives a hospital visit and is briefed about a yacht involved in a conspiracy with a 'Jap sub'.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Jap Sub Conspiracy

sub_scenes.title: Stowaway Plan and Yacht Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans with Toby to infiltrate the yacht, and Toby successfully sneaks aboard.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Toby's Plight
sub_scenes.description: On the yacht, crew activities are shown, Pete discovers the depth chart, Toby is thrown overboard, and Duke senses something is wrong.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby's Plunge and Cry for Help

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Confrontation and Namor's Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Human Meteor's underwater investigation, his encounter with divers, and Namor's surprise attack on the submarine and yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Investigation Begins
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives into the water and discovers the sunken submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Encounter and Conflict with Divers
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor encounters hostile divers near the submarine, while the submarine crew prepares for action.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Spot and Approach Human Meteor
Divers Attack Human Meteor with Derogatory Remark
Continuing Underwater Confrontation and Diver's Mishap

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Attack and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Namor intervenes, attacking both the submarine and the yacht, disrupting the underwater conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Ship Observes Geyser and Prepares to Evade

Major_Arcs.title: Surface Investigation and Resolution of Yacht Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Duke's surface-level investigation on the yacht, the discovery of Peter's treachery, and the wrap-up of the yacht conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Return to Yacht and Depth Map Search
sub_scenes.description: Duke escapes the underwater chaos and arrives at the yacht, seeking information about the depth map.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Escapes and Arrives at the Yacht
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Post-Mission Wrap-up and Return to Normalcy
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby conclude their mission, visit Holden in the hospital, and Duke returns home to his mother.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs Nazi Fiends and Ambulance Scene
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a brief, seemingly separate story about the Liberty Lads fighting Nazis and an unrelated scene involving an ambulance and injured man.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Action Scene
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Liberty Lads fighting Nazi fiends in a war-like setting.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Man
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe an ambulance arriving at a house and an injured man being carried inside.

Major_Arcs.title: The Wallet Mystery and Confrontation with Mr. Horst
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows two boys who find a wallet and get entangled in a dangerous situation involving Major Bronson and Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Dropped Wallet and Garage Lead
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet leading them to a bus company garage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Chase
Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Disguised

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Horst's Threat
sub_scenes.description: Boys arrive at the garage, return the wallet, and are confronted by Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Returned, Boys to See the Boss

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Deadly Plan
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys while Bronson plots their demise.

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Intervention and Violence
sub_scenes.description: Chaos erupts, threats escalate, and Bronson intervenes violently.

Major_Arcs.title: Seeking Help and Marine Barracks Action
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the boys' attempt to seek help, leading to action at the Marine Barracks and confrontation with saboteurs.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Marine Contact
sub_scenes.description: The boys split up to seek help, Chuck encounters a Marine Sergeant.

sub_scenes.title: Secret Office and Sabotage Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Skip discovers a secret office and uncovers sabotage plans.

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Attack and Office Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Marine Barracks is attacked, leading to an office confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Arrival and Victory Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, engage enemies, and deal with the aftermath including Major's injury and eventual recovery.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Henry in South America - Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry in South America and their investigation into the kidnapping of President's daughter Rosita.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry's Mission
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and their mission against 'Hitler tools' in a desert setting.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission

sub_scenes.title: South American Town Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: The Champ and Henry are located in a South American town and confronted by soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery and Confrontation in South America

sub_scenes.title: Detention and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The Americans are detained, questioned, and learn about Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre, Mama, and Rosita Rescue Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces El Tigre and 'Mama', creating a misunderstanding about a rescue operation for Rosita.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Gasoline Demand and Forced Entry
sub_scenes.description: Discussion of El Tigre's gasoline demand and forceful abduction of two men.

narrative_arcs.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Car Entry
Arrival, Mama's Reveal, and Rosita's Rescue

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre's Hideout and Rosita Rescue Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the plan to infiltrate El Tigre's hideout, the diversion tactic, and the initial confrontation leading to El Tigre's reveal.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Entering El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Planning the approach to El Tigre's hideout and the infiltration under cover of darkness.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and El Tigre's Reveal

Major_Arcs.title: Interrogation, Search for Rosita, and El Tigre's Denial
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows interrogation tactics, the search for Rosita, and El Tigre's denial of kidnapping.

sub_scenes.title: Garbage Bin Interrogation and Search
sub_scenes.description: Interrogation using a garbage bin and search for Rosita by armed men.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

Major_Arcs.title: Rescue of Rosita and Hotel Assault
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the news of Rosita, the rescue plan, the ride to rescue her, and a separate hotel infiltration and fight.

sub_scenes.title: News of Rosita and Rescue Ride
sub_scenes.description: News of Rosita's location by Axis agents and El Tigre's determined ride to rescue her.

narrative_arcs.title: News of Rosita and the Rescue Plan
The Determined Ride to Rescue Rosita

sub_scenes.title: Concurrent Actions: Hotel Infiltration and Citadel Escape
sub_scenes.description: Horseback assault continues, hotel infiltration is planned and executed, and a citadel escape attempt is made.

Major_Arcs.title: Climax of Rosita Rescue and Government Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the climax of the Rosita rescue mission, with ongoing fights, threats, and the arrival of government forces.

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Fights and Growing Danger
sub_scenes.description: Continued fighting, new threats emerge with machine guns, and personal vendettas surface.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Protective Stand

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Government Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Alliances are revealed, gratitude is expressed, and government troops arrive to take control.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle - Capture and Torture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Devil Dog Dolan's jungle mission, his capture, and the subsequent torture and interrogation.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan fights in the jungle, and a soldier reports on a 'grave matter'.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog arrives in the jungle, senses danger, and is ambushed and captured by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity and Torture
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog is captured, brought before Grauer, and captives are subjected to torture and interrogation.

narrative_arcs.title: Brought Before Grauer and Suspicious Object
Orders, Forced Writing, and Torture Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Dolan's Actions, Flashback, and Vengeance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores Dolan's justifications, a flashback to Sam's burning, and Dolan's vengeful actions in response.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Justification and Interruption
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his actions but is interrupted and threatened.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback: Sam Burning and Dolan's Grim Justification
Grauer's Indifference and Orders Amidst Burning Huts
Dolan's Justification for Burning and Vengeful Declaration

Major_Arcs.title: Jungle Revenge and New Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Dolan's vengeful attack in the jungle, the death of the chief, and the formation of a new alliance, leading to a new mission.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Chief's Death
sub_scenes.description: Dolan ambushes natives, leading to a fight and the accidental death of the chief.

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Spanking
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the Captain's internal conflict, a fight involving Sam, and Dolan receiving disciplinary action for his disobeyed orders.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Sam's Fight
sub_scenes.description: Captain contemplates surrender and finds his son Sam in a fight.

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Murder Mystery Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and the murder mystery they are assigned to investigate.

sub_scenes.title: City Street Threat - Twinkle Twins Intro
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and a city street scene with a potential threat.

narrative_arcs.title: City Street Confrontation with Twinkle Twins

sub_scenes.title: News Office Assignment and Suspect Evidence
sub_scenes.description: Twinkle Twins are assigned to investigate a murder and learn about evidence against Tom Reilly.

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: Twinkle Twins investigate at the police station and then proceed to the hospital to find Guy Reilly's sick kid.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Guy Reilly
Hospital Reception and Inquiry about Miss Reilly
Persuasion and Access to Miss Reilly
Meeting Miss Reilly - The Sick Little Girl

Major_Arcs.title: Blood Transfusion Crisis and Community Help
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the medical crisis of Miss Reilly needing a blood transfusion, the discovery of blood type mismatch, and the community's response to help.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital - Blood Type Crisis
sub_scenes.description: Sympathy for Miss Reilly, discovery of blood type mismatch, and plea for help.

narrative_arcs.title: Sympathy for Miss Reilly and Blood Type Discussion

sub_scenes.title: Candy Store and Call to Elijah
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane leave the hospital, discuss Farnacci, and Dan calls Elijah from a candy store.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store and Phone Call to Elijah
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Elijah's Instructions: Connect Farnacci, Banker, Haskel, and Brown

sub_scenes.title: Radio Broadcast and New Lead
sub_scenes.description: Radio broadcast reveals Farnacci's gang and banker's threat, leading to a new lead in the Irish section.

narrative_arcs.title: Radio Broadcast about Farnacci's Gang and Banker Threat
Decision to Look for Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Search in Irish section leads to Mrs. Murphy who reveals Tom Reilly's sacrifice.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation: Tom Reilly's Sacrifice

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ambush and Street Brawl
sub_scenes.description: Taxi ambush and street brawl in Irish neighborhood, leading to police intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ambush and Dan as Witness

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Aftermath and Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Aftermath of the brawl, transport to hospital, anxious wait, community blood rush, and successful transfusion saving Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Mismatch and Community Appeal
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Happy Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Public outcry leads to police action, Farnacci's arrest, and a celebration of Lassie Reilly's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning Police Intervention and Media Coverage
Accusation and Denial Regarding Blood Donation
Confirmation of Farnacci's Gang Affiliation and Impending Arrest
Celebration of Recovery and Future Adventures
